scripts.all-install: npm i && npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.all-i: npm i && npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.all-update: npm i && npm run client-update && npm run server-update
scripts.all-uninstall: npm i && npm run client-uninstall && npm run server-uninstall
scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run dev --prefix client' 'npm run dev --prefix server'
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run all-install && npm run build
